name: poeaffix.net (dark)
description: Blackout CSS for poeaffix.net to save my retinas from dying a fiery death at 4AM.
additional_info: Due to goofy handling of the #corruption section on the maps and strongboxes pages, those subheaders are still white (and slightly offcenter). Until the site dev fixes it, that's the way it's going to be. Not going to implement hacky workarounds for those two pages for what are ultimately very minor issues.
